fancymenu.editor.audioalreadyloaded.desc:
The audio you want to add is already part of this layout!

You can't add the same audio multiple times.
fancymenu.editor.invalidaudio.title: Invalid audio file!
fancymenu.editor.invalidaudio.desc:
The file you want to load does not exist or has an unsupported file type.

Please check your file path and be sure that your file is a valid WAV audio file!
fancymenu.editor.invalidimage.title: Invalid image file!
fancymenu.editor.invalidimage.desc:
The image you want to load does not exist or has an unsupported file type.

Supported file types are JPG/JPEG, PNG and GIF.
fancymenu.editor.animationnotfound.title: Animation not found!
fancymenu.editor.animationnotfound.desc:
The animation you want to add does not exist.

Maybe you forgot to add all mandatory variables to its properties?

Always keep in mind that you have to restart your game
after you've added a new animation to the animations folder.
fancymenu.editor.texttooshort.title: Text too short!
fancymenu.editor.texttooshort.desc:
Your text needs at least one character to be a text!
Otherwise..it...would be nothing.

Nobody wants to be nothing, so don't do that to your text!
fancymenu.editor.cannotdelete.title: Element can't be deleted!
fancymenu.editor.cannotdelete.desc:
Sorry, but you cannot delete this element.

You will need to learn how to live with it..
fancymenu.editor.close: Do you really want to close the layout creator?
fancymenu.editor.audio.delete.msg: Do you really want to delete this audio?
fancymenu.editor.add.image.desc:
A simple image.
Supports local and web sources.
fancymenu.editor.add.animation.desc:
An animation.
Similar to GIFs, but higher resolution.

To learn more about animations,
visit fm.keksuccino.dev!
fancymenu.editor.add.button.label: Button Label
fancymenu.editor.custombutton.config.act: Send a chat message or command.
Open a link in your default browser.
Switch to the previous menu background.
Switch to the next menu background.
fancymenu.editor.deleteobject: Do you really want to §lDELETE §rthis element?
fancymenu.editor.web.invalidurl:
§ä§lInvalid URL!

This URL is not a valid URL or does not exists!
fancymenu.editor.textures.invalidcharact:
§ä§lInvalid characters!


The filename of your image contains invalid characters!

Please only use characters "a-z", "0-9", ".", "_" and "-".
Spaces, uppercase letters and any other special characters are unsupported.
fancymenu.ui.customguis.sure:
§ä§lAre you sure?


Do you really want to §ldelete §rthis GUI?

§lThis action cannot be undone!
fancymenu.ui.customguis.invalididentifie:
§ä§lInvalid identifier!


No custom GUI found with this identifier!
fancymenu.ui.creategui.identifieralready: §äIdentifier already in use! Please choose another one!
fancymenu.element.general.pick_element.d:
List will all elements at the position
of the mouse cursor when
you opened this context menu.

Useful for when you need to
select an element that's behind
another one.
fancymenu.elements.webstring.unabletoloa: Unable to load web text! Invalid URL or not connected to internet!
fancymenu.custombuttons.action.opengui.c:
§ä§lUnable To Open GUI!

The GUI you want to open either does not exist or isn't supported!

If this is an existing GUI, please contact the developer of FancyMenu to add support for it.
fancymenu.editor.custombutton.config.act:
Opens a GUI by its menu identifier.

Supports vanilla/mod GUIs and
custom GUIs made with FancyMenu.
fancymenu.editor.windowsize.biggerthan.d: Only Enable Layout if Window is Bigger Than X
Only Enable Layout if Window is Smaller Than X
fancymenu.editor.custombutton.config.act: Moves a file to a new path.
Copies a file to a path.
Downloads a file to a path.
Unpacks a ZIP file to a path.
fancymenu.editor.rightclick.scale.invali: Scale values can't be smaller than 0!
fancymenu.editor.object.stretch.not_supp:
You currently can't do that,
because the positioning or
sizing of this element does not
support stretching.

Try to change the orientation
and disable advanced sizing.
fancymenu.editor.object.stretch.x.desc:
Will stretch the element to the
width of the screen.
fancymenu.editor.object.stretch.y.desc:
Will stretch the element to the
height of the screen.
fancymenu.editor.object.stretch.unsuppor:
§ä§lUnsupported Orientation!

The current orientation of this element is not supported by this stretch action.

§lSupported Orientations: %s
fancymenu.editor.backgroundoptions.panor:
Sets the selected panorama
as active background panorama.

Removes the currently
active background panorama.
fancymenu.editor.items.button.btndescrip:
Tooltip to display
when the button is getting hovered.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.customization.onoff:
Toggle customizations
for the current menu.

§äThis needs to be enabled for
§älayouts to work!
fancymenu.overlay.ui.customization.overr:
Override the current menu
with one of your own custom GUIs.

§äIMPORTANT:
Shouldn't be used if you
just want to edit the look
of an existing menu.

To edit a menu, create
a layout instead!
fancymenu.overlay.ui.customization.manag:
§ä§lAre you sure?

Do you really want to §ä§ldelete §rthis layout?

§ä§lThis action cannot be undone!
fancymenu.editor.object.moveup.desc:
Moves the element one layer up.

§äIMPORTANT:
Selected elements are always on top,
so you will not see the change
until you deselect the element.
fancymenu.editor.object.movedown.desc:
Moves the element one layer down.

§äIMPORTANT:
Selected elements are always on top,
so you will not see the change
until you deselect the element.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.customization.manag:
Opens this layout in
your default text editor.

§äIMPORTANT:
You need to click the "Reload"
button, after manually changing
things in layout files!
fancymenu.editor.opencloseaudio.desc:
Play a sound when the menu is getting
opened or closed.
fancymenu.editor.openaudio.desc: Will play a sound when opening the menu.
fancymenu.editor.closeaudio.desc: Will play a sound when closing the menu.
fancymenu.editor.deleteselectedobjects: Do you really want to §lDELETE §rall selected elements?
fancymenu.editor.multiselect.object.stre:
Stretch all §lstretchable §relements
to the menu width or height.
fancymenu.editor.multiselect.vanillabutt:
Will reset the orientation
for all selected vanilla buttons.
Will hide all selected vanilla buttons.
fancymenu.editor.multiselect.button.butt:
Set normal and hover textures
for all selected buttons.
fancymenu.editor.multiselect.button.clic:
Will set the clicksound
for all selected buttons.

Will reset the clicksound
for all selected buttons.
fancymenu.editor.multiselect.button.hove:
Will set the hoversound
for all selected buttons.

Will reset the hoversound
for all selected buttons.
fancymenu.editor.items.playerentity.sets: Set the scale of the player.
fancymenu.editor.items.playerentity.play: Set the name of the player.

Will automatically set the player
to the client user.

Manually set the player name.

This doesn't have to be an
existing user.
fancymenu.editor.items.playerentity.skin:
Set the skin texture of the player.

This skin is prioritized over
the normal player skin.
fancymenu.editor.items.playerentity.cape:
Set the cape texture of the player.

This cape is prioritized over
the normal player cape.
fancymenu.editor.items.playerentity.rota: Set the body and head rotation.
Player will follow the mouse cursor.
fancymenu.editor.items.playerentity.crou: Set if the player should crouch or not.
fancymenu.editor.items.playerentity.slim:
Set if the player should have
the slim skin layout.

Slim skins have thinner arms.
fancymenu.editor.items.playerentity.text:
This texture either doesn't exist or is not a valid texture file.

§lSupported File Types: §rPNG
fancymenu.editor.items.orientation.btnde:
Sets the origin point from
where this element's position
should get calculated.

§üYou can see how an element
§üis affected by its anchor point
§üwhen you resize the editor window.
fancymenu.editor.add.slideshow.desc:
A slideshow.
To learn more about slideshows,
visit fm.keksuccino.dev!
fancymenu.editor.add.shape.rectangle.des:
A rectangular shape.
Supports custom HEX RGBA colors.
fancymenu.editor.items.shape.color.btnde:
Set the HEX color of the shape.
Supports alpha channel (RGBA)!
fancymenu.editor.object.movedown.desc.su:
§äYou can't move elements behind
§ävanilla buttons.

Instead, you can set the layout
§lrendering order§r to '§lbackground§r'
to render all elements behind
default menu content like
vanilla buttons.

§lRightclick §rthe editor background
to set the §lrendering order§r!
fancymenu.editor.dynamicvariabletextfiel:
§lPlaceholder Text Values

Insert placeholders into the text
that will later be replaced with
real values like
the player name or the MC version.

§l§äIMPORTANT:
You will see these values as
placeholders in the editor and
as real values in the actual menu.

Gets the version of a mod my its mod ID.

Just replace 'some_mod_id' in the placeholder
with an existing mod ID.

Gets the total mods count.
This includes disabled mods.

Gets the active mods count.
This doesn't include disabled mods.
Sets the text alignment.

§äUseful when the text width is
§änot always the same, like for
§äplaceholder text values.
fancymenu.editor.custombutton.config.act:
Runs a CMD/Terminal command.
Supports per-OS commands,
like in the example.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.current.layouts.des: Create and manage your layouts for this menu.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.current.layouts.new: Create a new layout for this menu.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.current.layouts.man: Manage your existing layouts for this menu.
Edit this layout in the layout editor.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.current.advanced.de:
Contains tools for advanced users.

§ä§lWARNING:
This stuff can §äbreak things
and is not needed in most cases!
fancymenu.overlay.ui.customguis.new.desc:
Create an §äempty §rGUI and
fill it with things.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.customguis.new.sure:
§ä§lAre you sure?

Do you really want to create a new §lempty §rGUI?

§äThis is §lnot §r§äthe same as customizing
§äan existing menu!

If you want to customize an exiting menu,
create a §llayout §rinstead.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.tools.menuinfo.desc:
Show the menu identifier of this menu.

You can left-click the identifier
to copy it.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.tools.buttoninfo.de:
Show information about vanilla buttons
when hovering them.

Has no effect on custom buttons.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.misc.openworldloadi:
Will open a dummy instance of
the level loading screen, that
is used for loading into worlds.

Allows you to customize this screen.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.misc.openmessagescr:
Will open a dummy instance of
the dirt message screen, that
is used for joining servers and
loading into worlds.

Allows you to customize this screen.
fancymenu.overlay.ui.reload.desc:
Reload FancyMenu.

§lWill reload:
- Panoramas
- Slideshows
- Mod Config
- Layouts

§ä§lWill NOT reload:
- Animations
fancymenu.editor.warning.unsaved:
Are you sure?

All unsaved changes for the current layout will get lost!
fancymenu.editor.layout.saveas.failed:
§ä§lSaving Failed!

Unsupported layout name or layout already exists!
fancymenu.overlay.ui.warning.unicode:
Unicode fonts are not fully supported by the FancyMenu UI!
Please consider turning unicode fonts off in the language settings!
fancymenu.editor.items.splash.refresh.de:
Pick a new splash everytime the menu
is getting reloaded or opened.
fancymenu.fancymenu.editor.layoutoptions:
Add this layout to a group to randomly
pick one of the group's layouts
when opening the menu.

Can be used to randomize
backgrounds and other elements.

Set the group of this layout.
One layout per group gets picked
when opening the menu.

If layouts of this random group
should be random everytime the
menu gets opened or if only one layout
should be picked the first time
the menu gets opened.
fancymenu.fancymenu.editor.backgroundopt:
Sets the selected animation
as active background animation.

Removes the currently
active background animation.
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.visibility: Set requirements for the element to be visible.
Show element if condition is met.
Show element if condition is NOT met.
Check if the user is in singleplayer.
Check if the user is in multiplayer.

Check if a world is loaded.

A world is loaded when the user
is in a SP or MP world.

Check if the real time's current hour is X.

You can separate multiple values by comma,
to check for more than one hour
at once.
Real Time Hour(s) (Separate Values By Comma)

Check if the real time's current minute is X.

You can separate multiple values by comma,
to check for more than one minute
at once.
Real Time Minute(s) (Separate Values By Comma)

Check if the real time's current second is X.

You can separate multiple values by comma,
to check for more than one second
at once.
Real Time Second(s) (Separate Values By Comma)

Check if the window width is X.

§äCurrent Width: %s
§äCurrent Height: %s

Check if the window height is X.

§äCurrent Width: %s
§äCurrent Height: %s

Check if the window width is bigger than X.

§äCurrent Width: %s
§äCurrent Height: %s

Check if the window height is bigger than X.

§äCurrent Width: %s
§äCurrent Height: %s

Check if a specific button is hovered.

§äTo get the element ID of a button,
§äright-click it and click 'Copy Element ID'.
Check for a specific game language.
Check if the game window is fullscreen.
Check if the operating system is Windows.
Check if the operating system is macOS.
Check if the operating system is Linux.

Check if a specific mod is loaded.

You can find the mod ID in the mod menu.
This menu is available by default
on Forge. On Fabric, download
the 'Mod Menu' mod.
Check if a specific server is online.
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.copyid.btn:
Copy the ID of this element, to use
it in visibility requirements, etc.
fancymenu.fancymenu.editor.dynamicvariab:
Localizes a text by the given key.

Just replace 'localization.key' in the
placeholder with a localization key.

§äCheck the wiki for how to add
§äyour own text localizations!

§äWiki: fm.keksuccino.com
fancymenu.helper.editor.properties.scale:
Force a GUI scale for this menu.

This will override the scale
set in the Minecraft settings.

§äOnly overrides the scale for the specific menu,
§änot all menus.
fancymenu.helper.editor.properties.autos:
Let FancyMenu handle the scale of
the menu, so your layout
works for every scale and
resolution.

To do this, resize the window
until everything looks good and
elements are not too far apart
from each other and click on
this button.

§äThis will make text look blurry
§äat some scales.
§äThis can't be fixed and the best
§äworkaround is to use images
§äwith background as text elements.
Here you can set the base window size of your layout.
This should be the size your layout was designed for.
If you made it in the current window size, just leave the values like they are.

§ä§lSomething went wront!

Setting base size for auto-scaling failed!
Please check if both values are §lbigger than 0
and that they are §lvalid numbers§r.
fancymenu.fancymenu.editor.dynamicvariab:
Gets the MOTD of a server.
Just replace 'someserver.com:25565'
with the actual server IP
and '1' with the MOTD line.
MOTDs only have 2 lines, so
the only valid line values are
'1' and '2'.

Gets the ping to a server.

Just replace 'someserver.com:25565' in the
placeholder with a valid server IP.

Gets the player count of a server.

Just replace 'someserver.com:25565' in the
placeholder with a valid server IP.

Gets the status (online/offline) of a server.

Just replace 'someserver.com:25565' in the
placeholder with a valid server IP.

Gets the MC version of a server.

Just replace 'someserver.com:25565' in the
placeholder with a valid server IP.
fancymenu.helper.editor.layoutoptions.ba:
Set an image, animation, panorama
or slideshow as background.

Slide the background image from
the left to the right window side,
if it has a wide format.

§äOnly works for background images.
§änot slideshows, animations or panorama cubes.

Removes the currently
active background image.
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.orientatio:
§ä§lError!

No element found with this element ID!

Set the position of another element as
anchor point, so this element
will always move with the other one.

§äYou need the element ID
§äof the parent element here.
§äYou can get the element ID by
§äright-clicking the parent element.
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.import.cho: Choose a setup from the saved setups.
Enter a path to a setup folder.
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.import.dif:
§ä§lWarning!

This setup was created in §ä%s§r, but you're using §ä%s§r!

The setup could be §äincompatible§r.

§üDo you want to import it?

§ä§lWarning!

This setup was created in Minecraft §ä%s§r,
but you're using Minecraft §ä%s§r!

The setup could be §äincompatible§r.

§üDo you want to import it?

§ä§lWarning!

This setup was created with FancyMenu §ä%s§r,
but you're using FancyMenu §ä%s§r!

The setup could be §äincompatible§r.

§üDo you want to import it?
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.import.inv:
§ä§lWarning!

Layouts with invalid menu identifiers found!

This can happen when a layout was made in another
version of MC or with another mod launcher.
It can also happen when a layout was made for
a mod menu, but the mod isn't installed anymore.

FancyMenu can try to fix identifiers for vanilla menus.

§üShould FancyMenu try to fix the identifiers?
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.import.suc:
§ö§lSuccess!

Setup successfully imported!

Please §ürestart §rthe game to finish the process!
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.import.err:
§ä§lError!

There was a problem while trying to import the setup!

Please send your log to the mod author!
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.import.con:
§ä§lAre you sure?

Importing a setup will §äoverride §ryour current one!

A backup of your current FancyMenu setup will be made, but
please §ämake a manual full backup §rof your Minecraft instance!

You can §ürestore §rthe automatic backup in the §üSetup §rtab of the menu bar.

§ä§lDo you want to override your setup now?
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.import.inv:
§ä§lError!

This folder is not a valid FancyMenu setup!
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.export.err:
§ä§lError!

There was a problem while trying to export the setup!

§äPlease send your log to the mod author!
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.export.con:
§ä§lAre you sure?

Exporting a setup will export your config, all of your layouts,
animations, resources and more, so you can share it with others.

§üDo you want to export your setup now?
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.export.una:
§ä§lWarning!

Your setup got exported, but §ä%s elements §rcould
§änot get exported§r!

You will need to §ämanually copy §rthese elements!

Do you want to see a list of the failed elements?
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.export.suc:
§ö§lSuccess!

Setup successfully exported!

§üDo you want to open the setups folder?
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.restore.co:
§ä§lAre you sure?

Restoring a backup will §äoverride §ryour current FancyMenu setup!

§äPlease make a manual full backup of your Minecraft instance!

§ä§lDo you want to restore the backup now?
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.restore.su:
§ö§lSuccess!

Setup backup successfully restored!

Please §ürestart §rthe game to finish the process!
fancymenu.helper.setupsharing.restore.er:
§ä§lError!

There was an error while trying to restore the backup!

§üDon't worry§r, your backup should be fine.
You can try to §ümanually restore it§r.

§üDo you want to open the backup folder?
fancymenu.helper.ui.setup.import.btn.des:
Import a saved setup.

§ä§lThis will override all of your
§ä§lFancyMenu settings!
fancymenu.helper.ui.setup.export.btn.des:
Export your current setup.

This includes your config, layouts,
animations, resources and more.
fancymenu.helper.ui.setup.restore.btn.de:
Restore a setup backup.

Backups are made before
importing a new setup.
fancymenu.commands.openguiscreen.error: An error happened while trying to open the GUI.
fancymenu.commands.openguiscreen.cannoto: Unable to open GUI! The GUI you want to open either does not exist or isn't supported! If this is a vanilla GUI, please contact the developer of FancyMenu to add support for it.
fancymenu.editor.custombutton.config.act: This text got copied to your clipboard!

Mimic the click behaviour/action
of a vanilla/mod button.

You need the §lbutton locator §rof
the button you want to mimic.

How to get the §llocator §rof a button:

§l1. §rLeave the editor
§l2. §rEnable §lTools -> Button Info
§l3. §rHover over the target button
§l4. §rRight-click the button
fancymenu.custombutton.action.mimicbutto:
§ä§lError!

Unable to execute button action!

Invalid button locator or unable to
open parent screen of button.
fancymenu.fancymenu.editor.dynamicvariab:
Get the label of a vanilla button.

Replace 'some.menu.identifier:505280' with
the correct button locator
of the target button.

The button locator points to a specific
button in a specific menu.

§äYou can right-click buttons
§äin the editor to copy its locator.
fancymenu.helper.editor.windowsizerestri:
Set the layout to only load
at specific window sizes.

§äIt's recommended to only use
§äwidth OR height, not both at
§äthe same time!
fancymenu.fancymenu.overlay.ui.tools.but:
§äYou need to enable customizations
§äfor the current menu, to use this tool!
You need to enable customizations for
the current menu before using the §lButton Info §rtool!
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.visibility:
Check if the current GUI scale is X.

You can check for bigger than ('>'),
smaller than ('<') and equals X.

For example, if you want to check
if the scale is smaller than 3.20,
type '<3.20' (without the '').
To check if the scale is equal to 1.0,
just type '1.0' (without the '').
When checking if the scale is bigger than 2.20,
type '>2.20' (without the '').
fancymenu.helper.editor.backgrounds.imag:
A static image.

Only JPG/JPEG and PNG are supported.
fancymenu.helper.editor.backgrounds.anim:
An animation. Like a video, but not, you know?

Please visit the wiki (fm.keksuccino.com)
for how to make your own animations.
fancymenu.helper.editor.backgrounds.pano:
A spinning cubic panorama like
the one in the vanilla main menu.

Please visit the wiki (fm.keksuccino.com)
for how to make your own panoramas.
fancymenu.helper.editor.backgrounds.slid:
A slideshow that shows a set of images.

Please visit the wiki (fm.keksuccino.com)
for how to make your own slideshows.
fancymenu.helper.editor.backgrounds.cust: Clear the currently active background of this type.
§üYou need to install the
§ü§lAudio Extension §r§üto use this
§üelement.

§äClick on the button to
§äopen the download page.

§ä§lDEPRECATED!

§äThis is part of the old
§äaudio system and gets removed
§ävery soon!

§äFor more information, read
§äthe tooltip of the button
§äto add a new audio element.
fancymenu.helper.ui.universal_layouts.bt:
Universal layouts are layouts
that get applied to every
customizable menu instead of
just one menu.

They can be used to apply
background images, sounds, etc.
to all menus at once.
fancymenu.fancymenu.overlay.ui.misc.open:
Will open a dummy instance of
the progress screen, that is
used for joining servers and
loading into worlds.

Allows you to customize this screen.
fancymenu.fancymenu.overlay.ui.misc.rece:
Will open a dummy instance of
the receiving level screen, that
is used for joining servers and
loading into worlds.

Allows you to customize this screen.

§äYou can only open this screen
§äwhile not in a world
§äor on a server!
fancymenu.fancymenu.overlay.ui.misc.open:
Will open a dummy instance of
the connect screen, that is
used for joining servers.

Allows you to customize this screen.

§äYou can only open this screen
§äwhile not in a world
§äor on a server!
fancymenu.helper.editor.layoutoptions.un:
Add a menu to the blacklist
by its §lmenu identifier§r.

§äMenus on the blacklist will
§äbe ignored by the layout, so
§äthe customizations don't get
§äapplied to this menu.

§äYou can get the identifier
§äof a menu by clicking on
§ä§lTools -> Menu Info §r§äwhile in the menu.

§ä§lAre you sure?

Do you really want to §äremove §rthis identifier?

§ä§lAre you sure?

Do you really want to §äclear §rthe blacklist?

Add a menu to the whitelist
by its §lmenu identifier§r.

§äIf there are menus on the
§äwhitelist, only these menus
§äwill be customized by the layout.
§äAll other menus will be ignored!

§äYou can get the identifier
§äof a menu by clicking on
§ä§lTools -> Menu Info §r§äwhile in the menu.

§ä§lAre you sure?

Do you really want to §äremove §rthis identifier?

§ä§lAre you sure?

Do you really want to §äclear §rthe whitelist?
fancymenu.fancymenu.editor.dynamicvariab:
Picks a random text from a TXT file.

Supports custom change intervals for texts.

Just replace 'randomtexts.txt' with
the path to your TXT file
and replace '10' with the
change interval in seconds.
An interval of 0 will make it
pick a text only once per session.
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.visibility:
Check if the real time's current day is X.

You can separate multiple values by comma,
to check for more than one day
at once.
Real Time Day(s) (Separate Values By Comma)

Check if the real time's current month is X.

You can separate multiple values by comma,
to check for more than one month
at once.
Real Time Month(s) (Separate Values By Comma)

Check if the real time's current year is X.

You can separate multiple values by comma,
to check for more than one year
at once.
Real Time Year(s) (Separate Values By Comma)
§ä§lImportant

Deleting a vanilla element will completely hide it.
To make it visible again, click on §lElement -> Deleted Vanilla Elements§r.
Used to display Beta build warnings and other things.
Store variables to use them
for placeholders and
visibility requirements.
Variable Name & Value; Separated by Colon
fancymenu.helper.buttonaction.paste_to_c:
Paste text to the
chat input field.
Append True/False & Text; Separated by Colon
fancymenu.helper.placeholder.get_variabl:
Gets the value of a stored variable.

Just replace 'some_variable' with
the actual variable name.
fancymenu.helper.visibilityrequirement.i:
Check if the value of a stored
variable is X.

The requirement value is
a combination of the
variable name and the
value to check if it matches
the stored one.

The example has variable name
and variable value wrapped
in <>, but you need to remove these!
Variable Name & Value; Separated by Colon
Check if the current server IP is X.
Check if a menu layout is enabled.
fancymenu.fancymenu.overlay.ui.tools.cle:
Will clear ALL stored values!

§äThis cannot be undone!

§ä§lAre you sure?

Do you really want to §lclear/reset §rALL stored variables?

§lThis action cannot be undone!
fancymenu.helper.buttonaction.toggle_lay:
Toggle a menu layout (Enable/Disable)
by its name.
fancymenu.helper.buttonaction.enable_lay:
Enable a menu layout
by its name.
fancymenu.helper.buttonaction.disable_la:
Disable a menu layout
by its name.
fancymenu.helper.visibilityrequirement.g:
Check if the player is
currently in survival mode.

Check if the player is
currently in creative mode.

Check if the player is
currently in adventure mode.

Check if the player is
currently in spectator mode.
fancymenu.customization.items.input_fiel:
A text input field.

Can be used to set variable
values by user input.

Link this text field to a variable.
Use the variable name.

The variable can be a new
or an existing variable.

Set the type if this text field.

The type defines what characters
the user can use in the field.

For example:
If the field is
set to "Only Numbers", the
user will only be able to
type numbers into the field.
fancymenu.customization.items.slider.des:
A slider button.

Can be used to set variable
values by user input.
fancymenu.customization.items.slider.edi:
Set the type of this slider.

When using the list type,
you can set a list of
text values and switch through
them when moving the slider.

The range type allows you
to switch through a range
of numbers.
You can set a min and a max value
when using this type.

The prefix of the slider label.

The base of the slider label
is always the current value.

The suffix of the slider label.

The base of the slider label
is always the current value.

The list of values.

§äOne value per line!

Link this slider to a variable.
Use the variable name.

The variable can be a new
or an existing variable.
fancymenu.helper.editor.global_visibilit:
Just like visibility requirements
for elements, this will set
these requirements on the
layout level.

This means, the whole layout
will be visible/invisible depending
on its requirements.
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.splash.van:
Adds a splash text that uses
the vanilla splash text source.
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.vanilla_bu:
The button locator points to a specific
button in a specific menu.

§üThe button locator is used for
§üactions like 'mimicbutton'.
Allows you to override the text at the
top of some menus with a custom one.

§äThis option might not work for some menus.

§äThe title needs to be at least 1 character long.
§äSpaces count as characters.
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.visibility:
Check if the real time's current week day is X.

First day of the week is sunday!

You can separate multiple values by comma,
to check for more than one day
at once.
Real Time Week Day(s) (Separate Values By Comma)
fancymenu.helper.editor.backgrounds.anim:
If the animation should restart
every time the menu gets opened.
§ä§lMissing Orientation!

To resize or move vanilla/mod elements, you have to
give them an §lorientation §rfirst!

You can do that by §lright-clicking §rthe element.
fancymenu.helper.editor.element.moving_n:
§ä§lMoving Not Allowed!

This element can not be moved!

It is recommended to delete it and
replace it with a custom element.
fancymenu.customization.items.text.desc:
Add a text to render in
your layout.

Choose between local and online
sources for the text content.
fancymenu.customization.items.text.base_:
Set the base color for the text.
Use HEX color codes.
fancymenu.customization.items.text.sourc:
§üDirect Text:
Directly input a text to render.

§üLocal Source:
Use a TXT file as source.

§üWeb Source:
Use the plain text content
of a website as source.

§äChanging the source mode will
§äreset the text content!

§äYou can undo source changing
§äby pressing §lCTRL + Z§r§ä!
fancymenu.customization.items.text.set_s: Set direct text content to render.

Get the plain web text content
of a website as text.
Use a TXT file as content.
fancymenu.customization.items.text.text_:
The text border is the space
between the text and the left
and right side of the element.
fancymenu.customization.items.text.scrol:
The color of the grabber.
Use HEX color codes.

If scrolling is disabled,
the scroll bar will be invisible
and you are not able to scroll
by using the mouse wheel or
the bar.
fancymenu.helper.placeholder.json.desc:
Parse a JSON and get a
value from it.

Replace 'path_or_link_to_json' with
the path or link to the
JSON file you want to parse.

Replace '$.some.json.path' with the
JSON path to the value you want
to get.

§üGo to §lbit.ly/jsonfm §r§üto learn
§ümore about JSON paths.
fancymenu.helper.placeholder.webtext.des:
Gets the first line of
plain text content from a website.

Replace 'http://somewebsite.com/textfile.txt'
with the link to the page you
want to get the text from.
fancymenu.fancymenu.editor.dynamicvariab: The width of the current menu.
The height of the current menu.
fancymenu.helper.placeholder.stringify.d:
Stringifies a text by escaping all
syntax characters ( " { } ).

This is useful when nesting other
placeholders as value. If the
replaced nested placeholder could
contain syntax characters that aren't
part of another placeholder, you need
to escape them.

§äPlaceholders in the value will be
§äreplaced first, so you don't need
§äto worry about them getting stringified.
fancymenu.helper.placeholder.elementheig:
Gets the height of an element
by its element ID.

Just replace 'some.element.id' with
the actual element ID.

§äYou can get the ID of elements
§äby right-clicking them in the editor.
fancymenu.helper.placeholder.elementwidt:
Gets the width of an element
by its element ID.

Just replace 'some.element.id' with
the actual element ID.

§äYou can get the ID of elements
§äby right-clicking them in the editor.
fancymenu.helper.placeholder.elementposx:
Gets the X position of an element
by its element ID.

Just replace 'some.element.id' with
the actual element ID.

§äYou can get the ID of elements
§äby right-clicking them in the editor.
fancymenu.helper.placeholder.elementposy:
Gets the Y position of an element
by its element ID.

Just replace 'some.element.id' with
the actual element ID.

§äYou can get the ID of elements
§äby right-clicking them in the editor.
fancymenu.helper.placeholder.calc.desc:
Solves arithmetic expressions.

Just replace the example expression
with the real one.

Set 'decimal' to 'false' if the
placeholder should return a LONG
instead of a DOUBLE.
fancymenu.helper.placeholder.mouseposx.d:
Gets the mouse X position.

§äAlways returns 10 while in the editor,
§äso you can still edit the element
§äwithout it following your mouse when
§äusing it for advanced sizing/positioning.
fancymenu.helper.placeholder.mouseposy.d:
Gets the mouse Y position.

§äAlways returns 10 while in the editor,
§äso you can still edit the element
§äwithout it following your mouse when
§äusing it for advanced sizing/positioning.
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.visibility:
Check if a text matches another.

Compare Modes:
equals, contains, starts-with, ends-with

Set the 3 dots after the 'mode' variable
to the compare mode you want to use.

Set the 3 dots after the 'text' variable
to the text you want to check.

Set the 3 dots after the 'compare_with'
variable to the text you want to
compare the first one with.

§äYou can check for multiple texts/modes
§äat once by separating multiple
§äcompare sections by comma.

Check if a number matches another.

Compare Modes:
equals, bigger-than, smaller-than,
bigger-than-or-equals,
smaller-than-or-equals

Set the 3 dots after the 'mode' variable
to the compare mode you want to use.

Set the 3 dots after the 'number' variable
to the number you want to check.

Set the 3 dots after the 'compare_with'
variable to the number you want to
compare the first one with.

§äYou can check for multiple numbers/modes
§äat once by separating multiple
§äcompare sections by comma.
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.features.a:
§äONLY FOR ADVANCED USERS!

Allows you to manually set the
position of the element.

Advanced positions support placeholders,
so you can calculate positions
by using the Calculator placeholder,
get positions of other elements
and much more.

Many useful placeholders for element
positioning can be found
in the "GUI" and "Advanced"
placeholder categories.

§äYou will not be able to resize or
§ädrag and move the element while this
§äfeature is in use.

§äONLY FOR ADVANCED USERS!

Allows you to manually set the
size of the element.

Advanced sizes support placeholders,
so you can calculate sizes
by using the Calculator placeholder,
get sizes of other elements
and much more.

Many useful placeholders for element
sizing can be found
in the "GUI" and "Advanced"
placeholder categories.

§äYou will not be able to resize
§äthe element on axes that got
§äoverridden by an advanced size.
fancymenu.helper.editor.properties.autos:
You need to set a §lforced GUI scale
before you can use auto-scaling!

It's recommended to use 2 as
forced GUI scale.

§äTo set a forced GUI scale,
§äright-click the editor background
§äand click on §lForce GUI Scale§r§ä.
fancymenu.customization.items.ticker.des:
Allows you to execute actions
every tick.

Supports asynchronous ticking
and tick delays.

Can be set to tick only once
every time you open the menu.

§äThis element is only visible
§äin the editor.
fancymenu.customization.items.ticker.add:
Add a new action to the list of
actions this ticker should execute.
fancymenu.customization.items.ticker.man: Add, remove and edit actions of this ticker.

§ä§lAre you sure?

Do you really want to remove this action?
fancymenu.customization.items.ticker.tic: Set the delay between ticks in milliseconds.
fancymenu.customization.items.ticker.asy:
If the ticker should run in
a separate thread (asynchronous).
fancymenu.customization.items.ticker.tic:
§lNormal: §rTicker ticks every tick.

§lSession: §rTicker ticks once
per game session.

§lMenu-Load: §rTicker ticks once
every time you load the menu.
Keep in mind that menus get
also reloaded when changing the
window size.
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.visibility:
Check if an element is hovered.
Use its element ID to identify it.

You can get the ID of an element
by right-clicking it in the editor.
fancymenu.helper.editor.items.playerenti:
Automatically make the entity look
like the client player.

Copies the name, skin and cape.

§äYou can't do this while
§ä"Copy Client Player" is enabled.

Set the player's name.

You can use any name here,
it doesn't have to be an
existing user.

Tries to automatically pick
the skin based on the
element's player name.

§äYou can't do this while
§ä"Auto Skin" is enabled.

Set the skin texture.
Supports local and web textures.

Tries to automatically pick
the cape based on the
element's player name.

§äYou can't do this while
§ä"Auto Cape" is enabled.

Set the cape texture.
Supports local and web textures.

Set the entity's scale.

Default scale is 30.

If enabled, the player will follow
the mouse cursor.
Set the player head and body rotation.

§äYou can't do this while
§ä"Follow Mouse" is enabled.
If the skin should be slim.
If the player name should be visible.

If the player should have a parrot
on their shoulder.

If the player's shoulder parrot
should be on the left shoulder.
If the player should be a baby.
fancymenu.ui.text_editor.error.multiline: Multiline text is not supported by the target.
fancymenu.customization.items.custom_but:
Add a new action to the list of
actions this button should execute.
Add, remove and edit actions of this button.
fancymenu.editor.loading_requirement.ele:
Manage this element's loading requirements.

Loading requirements can be used to
specify under which circumstances
an element should load/be visible.
fancymenu.editor.loading_requirement.lay:
Manage this layout's loading requirements.

Loading requirements can be used to
specify under which circumstances
a layout should load/be visible.
fancymenu.editor.loading_requirement.scr:
§ä§lAre you sure?

Do you really want to §äremove §rthe selected requirement?
This action cannot be undone!

§ä§lAre you sure?

Do you really want to §äremove §rthe selected group?
This action cannot be undone!

The requirement mode defines, what
the requirement should tell its parent
when its condition is met.

§üNORMAL §rmeans, it returns TRUE ("Yes, load!")
when its condition is met.

§üOPPOSITE §rmeans, it returns TRUE when
its condition is NOT met.

§üThis requirement has no value.
§üYou don't need to set one.
Edit the value of the chosen requirement.
§äYou need to select a requirement first!
§äYou need to edit the requirement value first!

The group mode defines how the group
should handle its requirements.

§üAND §rmeans, ALL requirements need
to be TRUE, which basically just
means they need to say "Yes, load!".

§üOR §rmeans, only ONE requirement
needs to be TRUE.
§äYou need to add at least one requirement first!

§äThe group identifier is already used
§äfor another group!
Add a requirement to this group.
§äYou need to select a requirement first!

Add a new requirement group.

Requirement groups can hold multiple
requirements and basically
make them one big requirement.

Requirement groups have two modes.
In §üAND §rmode, all requirements need
to return TRUE (which means "Yes, load!"),
but in §üOR §rmode, only one requirement
needs to return TRUE.
§äYou need to select a group or requirement!
Edit the selected group or requirement.
Remove the selected group or requirement.
fancymenu.editor.action.screens.finish.n: §äYou need to select an action first!

fancymenu.overlay.menu_bar.tools.copy_cu:

many places of the customization system.

for a screen and it's part of the
button locator, which is basically a 'path'
to a button in a menu.
